name: Arrows Got Your Back
description:
_______________________________________

IMPORTANT PLEASE READ

___________________________________________

Use the Left and Right arrow keys to rotate the player around

Use the incoming arrows to move to a higher or lower orbit

Collect as many coins as you can

Once you collect them, Go back to the starting point to receive your score

And don't worry, arrows got your back. Enjoy :)

                                                          - Kridotusk & Xtramaze                                                         

__________________________________________

Made for VimJam 2020

Theme : There and back

Focus : Collectibles

__________________________________________________

Kridotsuk : Code, Graphics, Game Design, SFX

XtrAmaze : Music

Subscribe to XtrAmaze - Music Master on Youtube

_____________________________________________

Game Engine : Unity

SFX : Bfxr

_____________________________________________
